definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: imbibe, drink largely (NH id.; Aram. [[סְבָא]] id. (rare); cf. As. sabû, sesame-wine Dl:HWB;—Ar. sab0’un wine, is prob. loan-wd. and saba0’a import foreign wine denom., Frä:157 f);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 1 pl. cohort. [[נִסְבְּאָה]] Is 56:12; Pt. act. [[סׂבֵא]] De 21:20, Pr 23:21; pl. [[סובאים]] Ez Eze 23:42 Kt (Qr [[סָבָאִים]], v. infr.); cstr. [[סׂבְאֵי]] Pr 23:20; pass. [[סְבוּאִים]] Na 1:10; —imbibe, c. acc. [[שֵׁכָר]] Is 56:12; pt. act. = subst. wine-bibber, drunkard De 21:20, Pr 23:21 (both + [[זוֹלֵל]]); fully, [[סׂבְאֵי יׇי֑ן]] Pr 23:20 (+ [[זׁלֲלֵי בָשָׂר]]); so also Ez Eze 23:42 Kt (Qr perh. n. gent., so SyrVer AV, v. infr.), which rd. Sm RV Sgfr:Kau Da; Co thinks dittogr. of [[מוּבָאִים]], but perh. the reverse (Toy:Hpt om. [[מוּבָאִים]]): > Berthol (q. v.) [[מִסְּבָא]]; other conj. v. in Sm; [[וּכְסָבְאָם]] [[סְבוּאִים]] Na 1:10 is prob. corrupt, pt. pass. of person dub., and sense obscure; del. both as dittogr. Gunkel:ZAW xiii (1893), 235 Now; om. in transl. We Kau. On Ho 4:18 v. [[סׂבֶא]].
